title: Redcurrant meringue tart
ingredients: ['For the base', '100g unsalted butter', '100g caster sugar', '100g plain flour', '50g cornflour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 egg yolk', 'zest from 1 lemon', '1 to 2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'semolina or breadcrumbs', 'For the meringue', '5 to 6 egg whites', '200g caster sugar', '500g redcurrants']
